content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "google" command to search for "Best kayaking destinations in the world" and received a list of URLs. I used the "browse_website" command to visit the websites. I also used the "write_to_file" command to create a file named "adventures.txt" and wrote about my decision to explore the world through kayaking. I plan to visit the top kayaking destinations around the world and document my adventures through writing and photography to inspire others to explore the world responsibly.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "Best time of year to kayak in Norway\'s fjords"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.nordicvisitor.com/blog/best-time-go-visit-norway/", "https://www.kayak.com/flight-routes/United-States-US0/Norway-NO0", "https://www.responsiblevacation.com/vacations/norway/travel-guide/best-time-to-visit-norway", "https://www.cruisecritic.com/articles/everything-you-need-to-know-about-a-norway-cruise", "https://www.thetimes.co.uk/travel/destinations/europe/norway/norway-fjord-cruises-summer-or-winter", "https://www.firebirdtours.com/blog/top-10-norway-kayaking-trip-routes", "https://www.kimkim.com/c/norway-fjords-in-october-travel-tips-weather-and-more", "https://www.muchbetteradventures.com/magazine/norway-fjords-map/"]', type='action_result')]
"""
